name: Run Away Dice
description:
Run Away Cube is a Endless runner in which player has to Match the Laser Color with the Colored face of the Dice, use WASD or Arrow Keys to rotate the DICE and go as far as Possible.

3D Artist:https://mr-isometric.itch.io/
Programmer:https://subhajit-adhikari.itch.io/

Free Sounds from https://pixabay.com/
UI from Unity Asset Store.
